promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young rare dragon steel-type pokemon holding a ancient club. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Clubigon, a a young rare dragon steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Synchro Hammer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "steel" or "Clubigon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, dragon-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This rare, youthful behemoth of metal and myth, Clubigon, uses its Synchro Hammer ability to carve paths in rocky habitats.
